title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.9 - Accident insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.9 - Accident insurance

State Regulations

Accident insurance is an insurance policy which provides coverage, singly or in combination, for death, dismemberment, disability, or hospital and medical care caused by accident or specified kinds of accidents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
52.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
